meanings: after this, henceforth, in the future, hereafter, from now[this time, today] on
following the outbreak of the Korean War

vlive.korean: 그 이후로 "행복하다"라는 느낌을 받은 적은 없는 거 같아요 - 진짜? Since then, I've never felt that I'm happy. - Really? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
vlive.english: Since then, I've never felt that I'm happy. - Really?

vlive.korean: 조기 퇴근을 안 하고 열 시 이후까지 계속 앉아 있었어요 근데... I didn't leave early, and I sat there until 10. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 대휘 컴백👏
vlive.english: I didn't leave early, and I sat there until 10.

vlive.korean: 데뷔 이후 처음이지 않을까 - 처음이에요? I think this is our first time doing this since our debut. - Really? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 그냥🐺
vlive.english: I think this is our first time doing this since our debut. - Really?

vlive.korean: [치킨을 먹은 웅이는 그 이후로도 승리의 기쁨을 만끽했다고 합니다...] [Woong who got a chicken dinner enjoyed his happiness after that, too...] View video AB6IX : [예삐소드] AB6IX (에이비식스) 서울가요대상 BEHIND
vlive.english: [Woong who got a chicken dinner enjoyed his happiness after that, too...]

vlive.korean: 한 2시 이후로? Probably after 2 am? 듣기 View video VICTON : 오랜만입니다..❄️

examples.korean: The rebels have waged a guerrilla war since 2001. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 반란군들은 2001년 이후로 게릴라전을 벌여 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The rebels have waged a guerrilla war since 2001. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: These machines have lain idle since the factory closed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 기계들은 공장이 폐쇄된 이후로 계속 놀고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These machines have lain idle since the factory closed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: from this day forward 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 날 이후 앞으로 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: from this day forward Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Housing standards improved immeasurably after the war. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전쟁이 끝난 이후로 주택 수준이 헤아릴 수 없을 정도로 개선되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Housing standards improved immeasurably after the war. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I haven't eaten since breakfast. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 아침 식사 이후로 아무것도 안 먹었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
